replies.body:
{{champion:157}} "Ok, we need to figure out who will take the One Doran's Ring to the Magma Chamber and destroy it."

{{champion:79}} "The magma chamber is a myth. They never finished it, only left it as an incomplete promise."

{{champion:45}} "Oh, it's very real. I, Veigar Greybeard have seen it, once. It is where Phantom Karthus forged the Doran's Ring, and it is where we shall destroy it."

{{champion:32}} "I will take it there, but I do not know the way."

{{champion:45}} "Yordo, you? Well, alright then, you have my staff."

{{champion:86}} "And my sword."

{{champion:32}} "Thank you, Garengorn."

{{champion:110}} "And my bow."

{{champion:201}} "My shield too."

{{champion:79}} "And my Barrel."

{{champion:110}} "How is that going to help us on our journey?"

{{champion:79}} "Because, silly elf. We need something to relax us after a hard day's work. Hahahahaha!"

****

{{champion:1}} **"GET EM TIBBERS!!!!!"**

{{champion:45}} **"YOU SHALL NOT PASS!!!!!!"**
"Destroys bridge, knocking himself and Tibbers down it."

{{champion:32}} **"GREYBEARD NOOOOO!!!!!!!"**

{{champion:45}} "Flash you fools."

{{champion:86}} "We have to go, now!"

{{champion:32}} "Let me save him, he was our carry!!!!!!"

****

{{champion:79}} "So you got us lost in the woods with your, _"tracking skills."_ Now what?"

{{champion:110}} "I am sure Garengorn knows what he is doing."

{{champion:201}} "You guys need have trust. Like we trust Yordo to deliver the Dorans Ring, we must trust Garengorn to lead us. Oh ho, that is a bright light."

{{champion:13}} "Yes, Mr. Lionheart. It is I, Ryze Whitebeard. I am the revived version of Veigar Greybeard. Phantom Karthus is going to attack Middle-Runterra soon. We must prepare."

{{champion:86}} "Hmm, you are a little bit taller than I remember."

{{champion:13}} "Is that a short joke?"

****

{{champion:32}} "We are almost there, Ram. If I feed, you will have to carry me."

{{champion:33}} "Ok."

{{champion:32}} "You are a man of many words, Ram. Maybe one day we can go back to the BandleShire, and you can plant that Maokai you always wanted to."

Someone get this man a Silmaril {{item:3363}} 
Mega-props for an awesome story and solid Tolkein lore respectively.
{{summoner:4}} "Flash you fools" lol
{{champion:34}} don't worry the eagles will save y'all!

That was hilarious. But is Yasuo supposed to be Elrond, just because of his forehead looking like Hugo Weaving's? Character-wise, I'd say he's a better match for Aragorn than Garen is.

There might even be a reference to Aragorn in Yasuo's dialogue.
Yasuo says "A wanderer isn't always lost."
The poem about Aragorn says "Not all those who wander are lost."

Yeah, Yasuo would have been a great Aragorn too. But I have always compared Rugged Garen to Aragorn, to me they look so similar.
Plus, I liked the Garengorn pun.

As far as Yas being Elrond. He just felt like the right choice to me.

I feel as though Gravelord Azir makes for a better Sauron than Phantom Karthus. I mean his mask looks pretty Sauron-like, he has his own evil hordes, and he has his own dark tower to hang out in.

On a related note, is anyone else disappointed Gravelord Azir's towers don't have a giant eye floating above them?
Gravelord Azir is the Witch King.

What about Lord Mordekaiser? {{champion:82}} He looks kind of like Lord Sauron with the mace and resembles Sauron's master from Tolkien's book "The Silmarillion". Gravelord Azir seems more like he could be the Witch King of Angmar. He has his own troops to follow him and he leads them into battle just like the Witch King did with the Nazgûl. And yes you're right those towers would be nice with an eye. :)
wouldn't{{champion:102}}  be the monster in the mines?

Yo what if there was a Hobbit one, Shyv would be Smaug


...Gimme a minute, it might not be good but here goes :P



{{champion:17}} (Steals shyv's red buff, and goes invisible)


{{champion:102}} Well... thief... I smell you...

I hear your breath... I feel your air...

Where are you? _Where are you?_ 

Come now, don't be shy. 

_Step into the light._ 


{{champion:17}} (comes out of hiding)


{{champion:102}} There you are, _thief_ in the _shadows_.


{{champion:17}} I did not come to steal from you, O Shyv, the stupendous. I merely wanted to gaze upon your magnificence; to see... to see if you really were as OP as the patch notes say. (whimpers) I did not believe them!

{{champion:102}} (Steals baron, then gets a pentakill)

{{champion:102}} _AND DO YOU... NOW?_

{{champion:33}} ok
Thats a Dark Souls gragas PRAISE THE SUN {{item:3751}} {{champion:89}} {{item:3751}}
They're taking the hobbits to Isengard! {{champion:110}}

So Ryze is Gandalf the White, Varrus is Garret from Thief, Braum is King Richard "Lionheart," and Gragas is Solaire from Dark Souls, and all of this in the theme of a Dungeons & Dragons party. BEST 750 SKINS EVER!!
I swear I had noting to do with this.
Mhmmmm...
I swear.

{{champion:101}} So I'm the final boss, right?

{{champion:6}} Nah, I got that job already. I'm the scariest thing they could find.

{{champion:120}} I'm right here, you know.

{{champion:6}} Horses aren't scary.

{{champion:120}} Excuse me, but I am a shadow of war, not a horse.

{{champion:238}} Did someone say shadow?

{{champion:101}} Oh goddamnit, who's the real final boss.

{{champion:79}} I'M *burps* THE REAL FINAL BOSS.

{{champion:6}} ...You're one of the adventurers...

{{champion:79}} SHUT UP AND... FIGHT... M-ME... *passes out*

{{champion:120}} So we still don't have a final boss then.

{{champion:45}} Well, I have a final boss skin, so I am the final boss.

{{champion:6}} Cool, and I'm a giant crab as a skin. What's your point?

{{champion:266}} Fools. I am the true boss.

*everyone starts beating up each other in an attempt to prove they are the true boss*
{{champion:45}} Well, it seems I am the only one left. I guess I'm the bo-

*{{champion:32}} appears and kills him by mistake*

*{{champion:79}} wakes up*

{{champion:79}} Oh, sorry, got a lil' tipsy there. Now where's the final boss? 

*looks at {{champion:32}}*

{{champion:79}} Ah, there he is. KILL HIM!

*the party beats up {{champion:32}}*

So they all killed {{champion:32}} and lived happily ever after. The end.

10/10 Dnd campaign would write again.

The fight raged on for a century.
Many lives were claimed but eventually
the Champion stood,
the rest saw the better,
{{champion:36}} in a blood stained sweater.
